sentences.en: Acupressure is manual pressure applied to a specific slightly depressed point on the body.
sentences.cn: 指压按摩是用手按压人体某个轻微凹陷的穴位。

sentences.en: Acupressure is used to release tension spots in the shoulders and neck.
sentences.cn: 指压按摩用于缓解肩部和颈部的紧张。

sentences.en: Acupressure therapy is effective for many types of illnesses.
sentences.cn: 按摩治疗对许多病症都有效.

sentences.en: It is better to treat your condition with acupressure therapy.
sentences.cn: 用按摩疗法治您的病效果较好.

sentences.en: Many combine Therapeutic Touch with similar therapies such as hypnosis, massage, or acupressure.
sentences.cn: 多数人用类似治疗例如催眠 、 按摩或针压法结合治疗触摸.

trans.tran_en: a treatment for pain and disease that involves pressing your hands on particular parts of the body
